name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise
description: Hewlett Packard Enterprise is a worldwide company that provides efficient & sustainable datacentre IT services. Their commitment to sustainability encompasses "as-a-Service" solutions, which enable better agility, optimisation of computing power, reduction of overprovisioning...They also offer energy-efficient infrastructures and sustainable best practices for hardware deployment.
